invocations.description: Closes your game client. By default, a message will be printed in WindBot console saying which script called this function. If you don't want to show this warning, set dontshowalert to true.
invocations.ex:
auto(100)
if paround(9) > 0 then
	if $battlesigned then
		logout()
	else
		closeclient()
	end
end
invocations.exDescription: Each 100 milliseconds, it will check if there's a player on your screen. If so, it will check if you are battle signed (can logout or not). If you can, it will simply logout, by pressing CTRL+L, otherwise, it will shut the client down.
